what I use

01

HTML & CSS

When coding HTML and CSS (SASS), I like using BEM class naming methodology. The main reasons why I code this way are efficiency and the end result is made of fewer lines of code.

02

JAVASCRIPT

Gulp is definitely one of the main things I use when I'm working on a vanilla project. I'm also pretty familiar with using GSAP so many of my projects will have some sick animations.

03

SVELTE ❤

I LOVE Svelte and I feel very comfortable using it. The main reason why I use it is its huge supremacy over other JavaScript frameworks in terms of performance, code length etc.
